mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_organization(id, organization_name, create_time, description, field_01, field_02, field_03, field_04, field_05) values ( #{id}, #{organizationName}, now(), #{description}, #{field01}, #{field02}, #{field03}, #{field04}, #{field05} )
mapper.update: update t_sys_organization set organization_name = #{organizationName}, description = #{description}, field_01 = #{field01}, field_02 = #{field02}, field_03 = #{field03}, field_04 = #{field04}, field_05 = #{field05}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, organization_name as organizationName, create_time as createTime, description as description, version as version, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_sys_organization where id = #{id}
